sentences.en: After she jacked in the teaching, Jane got herself a job with a shipping line.
sentences.cn: 辞去教书工作之后，简在一家航运公司找了份差事。
英国的船舶总数已经减少.

sentences.en: Knock down the machine before shipping.
sentences.cn: 在装运前把机器拆卸开来.

sentences.en: Mr. Brown has held 500 shares in the shipping company.
sentences.cn: 布朗先生持有该家航运公司的500份股份.

sentences.en: The canal has been closed to shipping.
sentences.cn: 这条运河已对所有的船舶关闭.

sentences.en: The canal is open to shipping.
The collision took place in the busiest shipping lanes in the world.
sentences.cn: 撞船事故发生在全世界最繁忙的航道上。

sentences.en: The company provides a styrofoam cushion to protect the tablets during shipping.
sentences.cn: 该公司用泡沫塑料包住牌匾，以防止其在运输过程中受损。

sentences.en: The Greeks are still powerful players in world shipping.
sentences.cn: 希腊依然是世界航运业强有力的竞争者。

sentences.en: The port is closed to all shipping.
The ship went through the busy shipping lanes of the English Channel.
sentences.cn: 这艘轮船通过了繁忙的英吉利海峡船运航线.

sentences.en: There's a shipping charge of ￡5 added to the price.
sentences.cn: 价格之外另加五英镑运输费.

sentences.en: These conditions are very hazardous for shipping.
sentences.cn: 这些情况对航海非常不利.

sentences.en: They sent naval forces to protect merchant shipping.
sentences.cn: 他们派出了海军保护商船。

sentences.en: We are today shipping you another machine.
sentences.cn: 我们今天把另一台机器运给你们.

phrases.tran_cn: 代发货；制造商直接出货；转运配送
船舶代理；船舶代理公司；航运公司
运货代理商；装船代理处；运货经纪人
唛头；发货标记；装运标志

trans.tran_cn: [船]船舶，船舶总数，航运，海运，运送
